entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 10:54 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
